question: Tottenham (-0.5) vs. Luton (+0.5)
description:
In the upcoming EPL game, scheduled for October 7, 7:30 AM ET: 

If Tottenham wins, this market will resolve to "Tottenham -0.5". Otherwise, this market will resolve to "Luton +0.5".

If the game results in a draw, the market resolves to "Luton +0.5".

If the game is not completed by October 14, 2023 (11:59 PM ET), the market will resolve to 50-50

events.title: EPL
events.description: This is a market group for EPL games happening on 2023-10-07

question: Packy vs Harry: TCS London Marathon - who beats their time by more?
description:
This market will resolve to the runner who has a better marathon time relative to their goal in the 2024 TCS London Marathon.

Packy McCormick's goal time is 2:57. Harry Stebbings's goal time is 3:20. 

For example, if Packy got 2:55 and Harry got 3:15, the market would resolve to "Harry" since he beat his goal by 5 minutes whereas Packy only beat his goal by 2 minutes.

If the 2024 TCS London Marathon is cancelled or delayed until after October 31 2024 ET, this market will resolve 50-50.

If one runner announces they will not participate, this market will resolve to the other runner.

question: Will Kari Lake be the next Speaker?
description:
This market will resolve to "Yes" if Kari Lake is elected to be the next US Speaker of the House after Kevin McCarthy's ousting on October 3, 2023. Otherwise, this market will resolve to "No".

For the purpose of resolving this market, unelected or temporary Speakers will not count toward a "Yes" resolution (e.g. Speaker Pro Tempore).

The primary resolution source for this market will be information from the US government, however a consensus of credible reporting will also be used.

If a new US Speaker of the House is not elected by June 30, 2024 11:59 PM ET, this market will resolve to "No."

events.title: Who will be the next speaker?

question: Will Fantano rate Drake's new album a 7 or higher?
description:
This market will resolve to “Yes” if Anthony Fantano’s Needle Drop gives Drake’s new album “For all the Dogs” a 7 or higher. Otherwise this market will resolve to “No.”

The primary resolution source will be https://www.youtube.com/@theneedledrop specifically the description of the video where he rates For all the Dogs. If theneedledrop gives it a non-numeric score, the decentralized resolver UMA will determine whether it translates to a 7 or higher. 

If he doesn’t rate "For all the Dogs" by Dec 31, 2023 ET, this market will resolve to “No.”

events.title: Will Fantano rate Drake's new album a 7 or higher?

question: SBF sentenced to life?
description:
This market will resolve to "Yes" if Samuel Bankman-Fried (SBF) is sentenced to life in prison, with or without the possibility of parole, for the charges for which he is presently on trial (as of Oct 3, 2023) by 11:59 PM ET on June 30, 2024. Otherwise, this market will resolve to "No".

If SBF is sentenced to a specific number of years (e.g. 150 years) that would have him in prison past the end of his natural lifespan, this market will not resolve to "Yes" - only a life sentence will suffice for a "Yes" resolution.

This market will resolve based on the first sentence rendered by the court regarding SBF's present trial.

If SBF's ongoing trial ends (e.g. mistrial) without the rendering of a sentence, this market will immediately resolve to "No".

The primary resolution source will be official information from the US court system, however a consensus of credible reporting will also be used.

question: Drake's "For All the Dogs" over 350k sales week 1?
description:
This market will resolve to "Yes" if 'For All the Dogs' has over 350,000 sales including streaming equivalents in its first week. Otherwise, this market will resolve to "No".

The primary resolution source for this market will be the "HITS TOP 50" list found at https://hitsdailydouble.com/sales_plus_streaming. This market will resolve according to the figure in the column titled "TOTAL" once the list is finalized.

If the chart specified herein is rendered permanently unavailable or does not list 'For All the Dogs', another credible resolution source may be chosen.
